Author: nectarinepit
Text: I am so bloated right now. I'm a solid 8lbs up from my weight last Friday due to a 6k calorie binge Saturday and having only 3 tiny #2s. Jfc it has been messing with me so bad. I haven't been this heavy in like...a year. Normally my binges aren't this bad and my weight steadily goes down over a few days and is then back to normal, but it just keeps going up this time )':

Author: VentingFooligan6000
Text: I have a deep appreciation for moments like those where I expect the worst only to be pleasantly surprised at the results  but when I'm right though that stuff hurts even if it was anticipated.
